name.en: Wish of OuTerverSe the World-Shattering Emperor
name.ja: <ruby>破<rt>は</rt></ruby><ruby>界<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby><ruby>帝<rt>てい</rt></ruby>ウィッシュ・オブ・アウターバース

summoning_condition.en: You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Wish of OuTerverSe the World-Shattering Emperor [L]" and "Wish of OuTerverSe the World-Shattering Emperor [R]". This card's name becomes "OuTerverSe" while in the Graveyard.

effect.en: Face-up non-Galaxy Type monsters on your opponent's field lose 3000 ATK. During your turn, this card becomes Galaxy Type, and it inflicts piercing battle damage.
